squeal.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a long loud high sound or cry
squeal.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to tell the police or someone in authority about someone you know who has done something wrong
squeal.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a long loud high sound or cry
squeal.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: She gave a squeal of laughter.
There was a squeal of brakes.
